sentences.sContent: From the hall the clock calling out the quarter hour, then a moment of stillness - time stalling - before, faintly, the clock in her study responded.
sentences.sContent_eng: From the hall the clock calling out the quarter hour, then a moment of stillness - time stalling - before, faintly, the clock in her study responded.
sentences.sCn: 客厅传来钟表敲打刻点的声音，接下来是短暂的静止——时间的停止，直到书房里的钟表微弱地做出了回应。

words.tran: 模糊的；头晕的；虚弱的；[医] 衰弱的
昏倒；变得微弱；变得没气力
